strings.Value: "Ugh, what a stench… though I smelled a lot of crappy stuff in my time!"
"It smells like someone taked a huge crap nearby! Couldn't we find a better place for camp?"
"Ha! Be grateful we're not in Abaddon, the native plane of daemons! According to what I've read, it smells of cinders, swamp gas, feces — and things far worse!"
"Seems like an animal died nearby… perhaps if we bury it, the smell will go away?"
"In moments like this I regret not carrying a flask of perfume with me, like so many other paladins of Shelyn!"
"And I am once again grateful that fate has spared me such distractions..."
"There's no water, and nothing to start a fire. – It's all just dirt and smoke..."
